name: COLLECC 3D
description:
***BETA BETA BETA*** Let me know of any game breaking bugs.

All hope seems lost when a spaceship crashes on a strange prehistoric world. Does this plucky Opabinia have what it takes to return home?

Collecc all 10 Bep15 Power cores to launch the escape pod. Snab dorits to stay alive. Don't get snabbed.

Keys

Move - WASD keys and Mouse
Snab/Inspect - Mouse Click
Rise - Space 
Sink - Control
Sprint - Shift
Open/Resize the Map - M key
Open the Bestiary - B key
Pause/Options - P Key

Secret Keys (If you get stuck somehow)

Reset player location  - Home Key

Clear save data - End Key
